text: @senatemajldr Yea, ok?  And while they r sacrificing their lives, u and ur CO-CONSPIRATORS r causing more deaths from covid19 by opening states up, as well as promoting white SUPPREMISISTS to wage war on INNOCENT lives who respectfully picket against trumps inactions and CONSTANT lieing.
